titleStmt.title: To the supreme authority of the nation, the Parliament of the Common-Wealth of England. The humble petition of the Lord Mayor, aldermen, and commons of the City of London, in Common Councell assembled.
titleStmt.author: City of London (England). Court of Common Council.
England and Wales. Parliament.
